ip_config.command: device ipaddr 172.23.11.109|device ipmask 255.255.255.0|device gateway 172.23.11.1|device macaddr b8:9e:a6:05:05:05

uart_config.command: serial port 1 baudrate 9600|serial port 1 stopbit 2|serial port 1 parity even

eth_port_config.command: eth port 1 trunk|eth port 1 native vlan 1|eth port 1 stpcost 10|eth port 1 aneg disable|eth port 1 duplex half|eth port 1 speed 100|eth port 1 name ethport1

vlans.command: vlan 987 create|vlan 987 port add 4|vlan 987 enable mgmt

mbgw_cfg.command: mbgw 1 protocol modbus tcp|mbgw 1 port 5050|mbgw 1 timeout 500|mbgw 1 master enable|mbgw 1 master breaker on|mbgw 1 remote port 4050|mbgw 1 remote ipaddr 192.168.1.101

ntp_config.command: ntp disable|ntp server ipaddr 192.168.1.101|ntp server port 200|ntp timezone 6|ntp enable

snmp_config.command: snmp v2c enable|snmp v2c community read public_test|snmp v3 name user spbec|snmp v3 auth user password|snmp v3 priv user p@ssw0rd

lldp_config.command: lldp enable|lldp receive 4 port enable|lldp transmit 5 port enable|lldp hold-multiplier 30|lldp timer 5

sftp_config.command: util sftp-config ip 10.100.207.50|util sftp-config port 2222|util sftp-config dir /sftp|util sftp-config username sftp_user|util sftp-config password spbec|util sftp-config enable

eth_port_config_snmpv2c.command: eth port 1 speed 10|eth port 1 access|eth port 1 name ethport1

uart_config_snmpv2c.command: serial port 1 baudrate 9600|serial port 1 stopbit 2|serial port 1 parity even

eth_port_config_snmpv3.command: eth port 1 speed 10|eth port 1 access|eth port 1 name ethport1

uart_config_snmpv3.command: serial port 1 baudrate 9600|serial port 1 stopbit 2|serial port 1 parity even
